text: @PressSec @THEHermanCain Hey Kayleigh, you forgot the part where Herman had tested positive for Covid-19 shortly after attending a Trump rally in Tulsa, OK.  Glad it was so good for Trump's ratings to hold a rally in the middle of a global pandemic.  Perhaps Herman Cain would be here today
